entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING
PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
LOWS AROUND 40
